item.title: Maggie add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "You will lose someone you can’t live without,and your heart will be badly broken, and the bad news is that you never completely get over the loss of your beloved. But this is also the good news. They live forever in your broken heart that doesn’t seal back up. And you come through. It’s like having a broken leg that never heals perfectly—that still hurts when the weather gets cold, but you learn to dance with the limp." -- Anne Lamott

item.title: Maggie add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "Write as if your parents are dead." -- Anne Lamott

item.title: Maggie add a quote by Arundhati Roy
item.description: "That's what careless words do. They make people love you a little less." -- Arundhati Roy

item.title: Maggie add a quote by Randy Susan Meyers
item.description: "Maybe when we recognize the trivial for what it is, we can concentrate on what we love most, what we most treasure." -- Randy Susan Meyers

item.title: Maggie add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "A good marriage is where both people feel like they're getting the better end of the deal." -- Anne Lamott

item.title: Maggie add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Maggie add a quote by Holly Black
item.description: "She loves the serene brutality of the ocean, loves the electric power she felt with each breath of wet, briny air." -- Holly Black

item.title: Maggie add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "Perfection is shallow, unreal, and fatally uninteresting." -- Anne Lamott

item.title: Maggie add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "Peace is joy at rest. Joy is peace on its feet. quoting her pastor in Salon, April 25, 2003" -- Anne Lamott

item.title: Maggie add a quote by anne lamott
item.description: "I said that I thought the secret of life was obvious: be here now, love as if your whole life depended on it, find your life's work, and try to get hold of a giant panda. If you had a giant panda in your back yard, anything could go wrong — someone could die, or stop loving you, or you could get sick — and if you could look outside and see this adorable, ridiculous, boffo panda, you'd start to laugh; you'd be so filled with thankfulness and amusement that everything would be O.K. again." -- anne lamott

item.title: Maggie add a quote by Mark Haddon
item.description: "Sometimes we get sad about things and we don't like to tell other people that we are sad about them. We like to keep it a secret. Or sometimes, we are sad but we really don't know why we are sad, so we say we aren't sad but we really are." -- Mark Haddon

item.title: Maggie add a quote by Liz Long
item.description: "Try to remember that even if they deliver the wrong cake, the limo driver is a no-show, there's a monsoon, and the band plays music you hate, you will still have just married the person of your dreams!!! Isn't that what the whole thing is really about?" -- Liz Long
